11.content: Now choose the lucky slave.
11.title: 1) Sakura Haruno.

choices: Will let his slave some rest
111.content:
Naruto was walking along the street of Konoha enjoying the long period of peace he created, with all his efforts, as hokage, when while he was thinking about some silly things he met Sakura.
Sakura: hi Naruto! How are you?
Naruto:fine thanks, but sakura I'm the hokage now, you should call me by my title! (said Naruto with proudness and his usal laughing face)
Sakura: Naruto you know, you can be whatever you want, you are always my team mate, and always "only" Naruto you know? (said Sakura with a little fleer on her face)
Naruto: as you wish Sakura-chan, but don't do it in public, remember I'm the highest authority here! (laughing face again)
Sakura: ok naruto-kun, but... can you follow me in my house? I want to show you a new special jutsu...
Naruto: what is that?
Sakura: follow me and you'll see it
Naruto: ok Sakura,now I'm too curious.Lets go!

They got in Sakura's house, then they went in Sakura's room.

Sakura: ok Naruto, be ready! Just lay there in the bed because I want "my hokage" comfortable, then close your eyes! You will see the surprise...
Naruto:yep, if you called me, the hokage, just to show a justu I'm sure that it must be great! I just can't wait!
Sakura: so do I naruto, so do I. (said Sakura hiding a evil grin)

Sakura did some seals, then she touched Naruto's chest, afterward she jumped silently on the bed without doing an only vibration or sound

Naruto: May i open my eyes?
Sakura: Wait a second it is almost done, now just kiss the air!
Naruto: why?
Sakura: just do it!

Naruto did as Sakura asked thinking he would feels Sakura's lips, but when he opened his eyes he saw Sakura's dirty and sweaty feet over him.

Naruto: what the hell? Sakura are you crazy?
Sakura: Nope! Hahaha! It was an enslavement justu!I invented it lot of time ago, but the only trouble was to find someone who would kiss my dirty feet!
Naruto:What?! I'm the hokage, the most powerfull ninja here! You can't beat me! I'll show you!

Before Naruto's could do a single action, even only a little reaction, Sakura did a little seal with her hand and Naruto fell down in the floor screaming in pain and sorrow, twisting his body like if a hundred volts would pass through his nerves

Naruto:Please stop! It hurts too much! I'll do want ever you want me to do!
Sakura: are you sure? Remember i can do it everytime i want using just a hand!
Naruto: yes, yes please!

Sakura with another seal ended the justu

Sakura: I know outside here you are the Hokage, but here you'll be my little foot slave, you'll call me Mistress and my feet will be your owers, your possessors!
Sakura: From now on when you will not do your role as hokage you will kiss, lick, smell and clean your owers , and you will implore, beg me to stay with them and to serve them as the good foot slave, toes servant that you are, is that ok?
Naruto: if it will not make me suffer again as some minutes ago then...then ok...
Sakura:ok remember to follow the rule and you'll not suffer, but try to disobey and i'll kill you slave!
Naruto: I'll do it mistress

Sakura: ok Slave, now knlee down and kiss your owners
Naruto was very angry, but he couldn't do otherwise so he got down on his knlee and he kissed Sakura's dirty and sweaty feet while she was moving her toes in the air, producing a really hard and penetrating foot smel in the air.
Sakura:dirty thrall what are you doing? You must do it with passion, with devotion! (said Sakura slapping Naruto's face)

Naruto dropped behind, on his back and Sakura started to trample his face
Sakura: you should love them! Treat them properly stupid slave!Can't you understand that you exist just to use your tongue on my feet!
Sakura: You deserve nothing but to get your face stomped !

After something like an hour Naruto was exhausted, and he decided to put apart his honor and to ask her mistress to stop, even if he had to beg her a pathetic, humiliating way

Naruto: Please my mistress stop! Please you feet, those which are my possessors need to be cleaned!
Sakura:uhm...let me think (while she was going on with the trampling)...you are beginning to think as the slave you are...uhm...to put my stinky feet before your dignity...ok! Do your honor then!

Naruto tried to take Sakura's foot with his hand and to lick it but he was out of energy.

Sakura: You waste all of your energy to avoid serious damage on your face? Isn't it?
Sakura: Well i want to help you, take out your tongue, your mistress will give you the honor of using your mouth to clean her feet! (Said sakura laughing)

Naruto took out his tongue and Sakura started rubbing her feet on it

Sakura: Slave do you feel honored by licking the feet that left your face in that condition?
Naruto: Yer mistress, I feel glad because my owners did me some Souvenirs to have with me when i want. (Said naruto smiling and hoping to save his self from another trample session)
Sakura: ok, now i'm tired of rubbing them my self, i'll put them all inside your mouth!
Sakure: i reccomend you to do a good job, right? I want your owners to shine! Or you'll stay there till they'll be swollen up!

111.title: Naruto's surprise

1111.content:
Sakura told Naruto to get back home and that she would call him whenever she had some other humiliation for him.

After a week, when Naruto's mind was about to forget the whole "foot nightmare", our Hokage was seaten in his office sealing some paperworks, when Sakura got in.

Sakura: Now eat the debris between my toes! eat the toe jam! Right! Collect all of them in your mouth!

Naruto was every single second about throw up, but he was to scared, so he just did what Sakura ordered

Sakura: how are my toe jam? Tasty?
Naruto: yes mistress Sakura! I love them!
Sakura: even better than ramen?
Naruto: of course my goddess, the taste of my owner is incomparable!

Sakura: Good, open your mouth wide now! (Said Sakura putting all of her toes and lot of her feet inside Naruto's mouth)
Sakura: Deeper! I want to touch your tonsils

Naruto was about to gag
Sakura put one foot deeper in Naruto's throat and the other on his nose, using her big toe and her ring-finger to close his nostrils

Sakura: ok now don't move or i'll use my pain-creator justsu!

Hearing that Naruto didn't move a single muscle till the foot on his mouth and the other on his nose by blocking air to his body made him pass out.

What else Sakura will think up for her poor slave?
